name: locationManager(_:rangingBeaconsDidFailFor:withError:)
desc: Tells the delegate that an error occurred while gathering ranging information for a set of beacons.DeprecatedUse locationManager(_:didFailRangingFor:error:) instead.
declaration:
optional func locationManager(_ manager: CLLocationManager, 
     rangingBeaconsDidFailFor region: CLBeaconRegion, 
                    withError error: Error)
